text: An siRNA was constructed ( Ambion Inc . , www.ambion.com ) to target a sequence unique to the <extra_id_0> NFAT5 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transcript : 5'-CAACATGCCTGGAATTCAA-3 ' ( nt 335 to 353 ) [ 31 ] .

As described , a control for non - specific siRNA effects , we used an siRNA targeting the <extra_id_0> green fluorescent protein <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> GFP <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) , 5' - GGCTACGTCCAGGAGCGCACC-3 ' .

MDM were transfected in 6-well plates using 1 microM of the indicated siRNA in siPORT NeoFX transfection reagent ( Ambion Inc . , www.ambion.com ) , prepared as recommended by the manufacturer , in a final volume of 750 microl in Macrophage-SFM medium plus 5 % heat - inactivated human AB serum .
The cultures were left at 37degreesC overnight after which cells were washed and incubated in fresh medium .
MDM were transfected two times for efficient knock down of <extra_id_0> NFAT5 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression before infection experiments were performed [ 31 ] .
